definitions.definition: To choose one or more elements of a set , especially a set of options .
examples: He looked over the menu, and selected the roast beef.
The program computes all the students' grades, then selects a random sample for human verification.

definitions.definition: To obtain a set of data from a database using a query .

main_definition: To choose one or more elements of a set , especially a set of options .
secondary_definitions: ( databases ) To obtain a set of data from a database using a query .
